name: Dark Waters
description: This piece is part of the "Why Bother With Reality?" project, which focuses on our ability to lose ourselves in a sea of screens, where truths are drowned in an overdose of fake news and entertainment. We built a border between the reality of the world and what we are willing to perceive, we lost ourselves in an infinity of alternate realities. A reflection on the human interactions in the age of social media. (15s loop - 1080 x 1080 - 60fps - created by @ufunk_parse)
